item.title: Tutorial of Ranzcr EDA
item.description: Competition https://www.kaggle.com/c/ranzcr-clip-catheter-line-classification Intro Thanks to RANZCR/resnext50_32x4d starter [training] Please visit here and upvote import os import pandas as pd from matplotlib import pyplot as plt import seaborn as sns Check File Size Check Each Size of Dataset Folder in this competition train_records = 4.5GB test_tfrecords = 0.5MB train (image data) = 6.5GB test (image data) = 0.8MB import os def get_folder_size(file_directory): # file_list = os.
